english_example_sentence: If he covers the old book with a new cover, it would be good.
russian_example_sentence: Если он накроет старую книгу новой обложкой, будет хорошо.
turkish_example_sentence: Eğer o, eski kitabı yeni bir kapakla örtse, iyi olur.
